arts.ttl: Cagliari vs Inter is the final match on Saturday
arts.sum: The hosts, who have won their last two matches against Parma and Lecce, are hoping for a third consecutive victory against the Nerazzurri, who are currently just one point behind Pisacane’s side and need this win to close the gap. That match ended 2–1 to the Nerazzurri, with goals from Thiago Motta and Coutinho for the hosts, and Larrivey for the Sardinians.
